# Graced Music Bot....
## Best discord multitasking bot you can think off.....
Click on Image to invite this bot to your server

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://bit.ly/GracedBotInvite)



Graced is a multi purpose discord bot with more than 30 commands including best Music System..

- üé∂Plays music from YouTube with cool UI and best sound quality 
- üìΩÔ∏èStream YouTube videos in server with your friends
- üì´ cool games like Chess, Fishing, Poker...

## How to host this bot...
- Just copy the code from my GitHub repository
- Open Relit, or click on this image      [![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://replit.com/)

- Go to Shell, and write 'npm install'
- It might take few minutes to install the dependencies, 
- After installing the dependencies, create an .env file and paste the discord bot token. You can get your token from (https://discord.com/developers/applications)
- Run 'npm i express' 
- If you see ytdl-core is older version, simply run 'npm i ytdl-core@latest'
- Now run the bot......


# To make Bot online for 24/7...
- copy the link, (https//:(your reple name.your replit username.repl.co)

- Now go to           
 [![N|Solid](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTMsI_MlVzZwqC3EW3Y4JnZ7CEQv0pNozuCdw&usqp=CAU)](https://uptimerobot.com/)
- Create an account and click on  'Add Monitor', and select 'https' option
- Now fill the require field and paste the link (https//:(your reple name.your replit username.repl.co).
- Now your bot is set to run 24/7.
